Package com.nitay.couponproject.facades

Class ClientFacade

java.lang.Object
com.nitay.couponproject.facades.ClientFacade
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdminFacade, CompanyFacade, CustomerFacade
public abstract class ClientFacade
extends java.lang.Object
Abstraction of the customer facade. Contains within it all the DAO (currently declared in the constructor)
See Also:
CouponsDAO, CompaniesDAO, CustomersDAO, AdminFacade, CompanyFacade, CustomerFacade

  • Method Details

    • login

      protected abstract boolean login​(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password) throws WrongCredentialsException, CrudException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Parameters:
      email - Client's email
      password - Client's password
      Returns:
      Boolean if log in succeeds
      Throws:
      WrongCredentialsException - When email/password not exist or match
      CrudException - If there is problem of getting all clients (used to compare email and password)
      java.lang.InterruptedException
